name: Rus
description: The Rus derive great benefit from the countryside. They are able to gather resources more readily from hunting and forestry and can field strong combat units. Enemies face strong early game fortifications and a diverse economy that cannot easily be disrupted.
descriptionCN: 罗斯可从乡村获得巨大利益，更容易从狩猎和林业活动中采集资源，并能集结强大的作战单位。他们在游戏早期阶段可发展出强大的防御工事和多样化的经济体系，敌人很难将其击垮。

overview.title: Civilization Bonuses
list: Construct Fortified Palisade Walls with +100% health.
Construct Wooden Fortresses — improved Outposts with +100% health and +3 garrison slots.
Construct Hunting Cabins — improved Mills that produce Scouts and generate Gold from nearby forests.
Gathering from animals earns a bounty of Gold — increased bounty provides economic bonuses to Villagers and Hunting Cabins.
Early Knight available in the Feudal Age (II).
Lodya ship can convert into any type of ship for a cost.
Fishing Ships don't have to return to a dock to drop off Food.

overview.title: Woodland Federation
overview.description:
Fortify the countryside with Wooden Fortresses that replace Outposts — comes with +100% health and +3 garrison slots.
Construct the Fortified Palisade Wall — comes with +100% health and faster build time.

overview.title: Hunter Princes
overview.description: Live off the land with Scouts trained from Hunting Cabins. Hunting Cabins provide the benefits of a standard Mill but with the ability to see into Stealth Forests and generate Gold based on the number of nearby trees.

overview.title: Druzhina Retinue
overview.description: Field the Early Knight in the Feudal Age (II).

overview.title: Lodya Reconstitution
overview.description:
Lodya ship can convert into any type of ship for a cost.
Lodya Fishing Ships process Food directly on the vessel — forgoing the need to return to Docks to drop off Food.

overview.title: Bounty Rewards
overview.description:
Gathering from animals earns a bounty of Gold and reaching certain thresholds of total bounty provides economic bonuses to Villagers and Hunting Cabins.
100 Bounty
• +5% Food gather rate
• Hunting Cabins generate 10% more Gold
400 Bounty
• +10% Food gather rate
• Hunting Cabins generate 25% more Gold
1000 Bounty
• +15% Food gather rate
• Hunting Cabins generate 40% more Gold

overview.title: Influence
overview.description: Oversee clear-cutting initiatives — Villagers drop off +20% more Wood when Lumber Camps and Town Centers are within a Wooden Fortress's influence.

overview.title: Unique Units
overview.description:
Warrior Monk: Religious light cavalry unit that inspires nearby units when in combat, providing +1 armor and +2 damage.
Horse Archer: Light ranged cavalry with high mobility and damage.
Streltsy: Handcannoneer which gets stronger when stationary and has a high damage melee attack.
Lodya ships: Can be converted into any type of ship.

overviewCN.title: 文明加成
list: 可以建造生命值 +100% 的硬木栅栏。
可以建造木制要塞，这种强化版的哨站生命值 +100%，驻扎栏位 +3。
可以建造狩猎小屋，这种强化版的磨坊可以生产侦察兵，通过附近的森林产生黄金。
丛野生动物身上采集食物可以获得黄金赏金，提升赏金可以为村民和狩猎小屋提供经济加成。
在封建时代 (第二时代) 便可生产早期骑士。
罗德亚船只可以消耗一定资源转换为任何类型的船只。
渔船不需返回码头便可放下食物。

overviewCN.title: 林地联邦
overviewCN.description:
可以使用木制要塞替代哨站，守卫您的领地。木制要塞自带生命值 +100%，驻扎栏位 +3。
可以建造硬木栅栏，生命值 +100%，建造时间更少。

overviewCN.title: 猎人王子
overviewCN.description: 与狩猎小屋训练的侦察兵一起生存下去。狩猎小屋可以提供标准磨坊的所有优势，同时还能够通过附近的森林数量产生黄金。

overviewCN.title: 皇家卫队侍从
overviewCN.description: 在封建时代 (第二时代) 就可以生产早期骑士。

overviewCN.title: 罗德亚重构术
overviewCN.description:
罗德亚船只可以消耗一定资源转换为任何类型的船只。
罗德亚渔船可以直接在船上处理食物，无需返回码头存放食物。

overviewCN.title: 赏金奖励
overviewCN.description:
从野生动物身上采集食物可以获得黄金赏金，而且总赏金达到特定数额时可以为村民和狩猎小屋提供经济加成。
100 赏金
• 食物采集速率 +5%
• 狩猎小屋产生 10% 额外黄金
400 赏金
• 食物采集速率 +10%
• 狩猎小屋产生 25% 额外黄金
1000 赏金
• 食物采集速率 +15%
• 狩猎小屋产生 40% 额外黄金

overviewCN.title: 影响力
overviewCN.description: 监督皆伐措施，当伐木场和城镇中心在木制要塞影响范围内时，村民存放木材量额外 +20%。

overviewCN.title: 独特单位
overviewCN.description:
僧侣战士：宗教轻型骑兵，可以在战斗中鼓舞附近的单位，为他们提供 +1 护甲和 +2 伤害。
骑射手：轻型远程骑兵单位，拥有较高机动力和伤害。
射击军：这种火枪兵在静止不动时能力会增强，并拥有极高的近战攻击力。
罗德亚船只：可以转换为任何类型的船只。
